questions: Q. 1. Mention any one development as goal of land less rural labourers.  		What is the development goal of rural people of India as per your viewpoint ?
answers: Ans.		Any one development goals of landless rural labourers can be :  Regular income.  Regular job.  Small piece of land.  Equal status in society.  1

questions: Q. 2. In what respect is the criterion used by the UNDP for measuring development of the countries, different from the one used by the World Bank?
answers: Ans. UNDP compares countries on educational level, health status and per capita income whereas. World Bank uses only per capita per capita income for measuring development.  1

questions: Q. 3. If there are 4 families in a country with per capita income of $ 15000. The income of 3 families is $ 10000, $ 20000, and $ 12000. What is the income of the 4th family ?
Q. 4. What is the advantage of per capita income ? Mention any one.
answers: Ans. It is the most appropriate criterion of measuring the development of any country. 1 mark each

questions: Q. 5. How is the average income of a country calculated ?
answers: Ans. Dividing the total income of the country by its total population.

questions: Q. 6. According to the World Bank , which country would be classified as a low income country ?
answers: Ans. Any country with percapita income of US $ 1035 or less .

questions: Q. 7. What is the most common indicator for measuring economic development of a country ?  Or 		Which is a useful measure for comparison between countries ? Or 		Which factor determines the development of a country ? Or Which income is also called average income ?
Q. 8. Into how many categories the World Bank has classified the countries ?
Q. 9. Which area of the world has the largest crude oil reserves ?
Q. 10. Which countries are called rich countries ?
answers: Ans. Countries with per capita income of US $ 12616 and above.
